title: Drawing, "Design for Knotted Pile Bedspread"
medium: Crayon and graphite on heavy tracing paper
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Perspective view, from the right side, of bed with headboard, night table, and curtain indicated lightly.  Bedspread shown in yellow, orange, turquoise, blue stripes down the middle and flaring over the pillow area.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Knotted Pile Bedspread".
Crayon and graphite on heavy tracing paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-91.
